words.ipa: ə kənˈkɑkʃən
words.spell: a concoction

words.ipa: ə ˌkɑnəˈsɜr
words.spell: a connoisseur

words.ipa: ə smɔl ɡɜrl rʌʃt pæst hɜr
words.spell: a small girl rushed past her

words.ipa: ə ˈstroʊlər
words.spell: a stroller

words.ipa: ə waɪn ˈteɪstər
words.spell: a wine taster

words.ipa: ən ɪnˈtɛns riˈækʃən
words.spell: an intense reaction

words.ipa: æz lɔŋ æz ju laɪk ɪt
words.spell: as long as you like it

words.ipa: kæn ju fɪks ðə kɑr baɪ jərˈsɛlf?
words.spell: Can you fix the car by yourself?

words.ipa: dɪd ju meɪk ðɪs keɪk jərˈsɛlf
words.spell: Did you make this cake yourself

words.ipa: dɪd ju peɪnt ðɪs baɪ jərˈsɛlf?
words.spell: Did you paint this by yourself?

words.ipa: du ju lɪv baɪ jərˈsɛlf?
words.spell: Do you live by yourself?

words.ipa: doʊnt ɡoʊ aʊt baɪ jərˈsɛlf æt naɪt.
words.spell: Don't go out by yourself at night.

words.ipa: ɡræb jʊər bæɡ!
words.spell: grab your bag!

words.ipa: hi ˈtrævəld tu ʤəˈpæn baɪ hɪmˈsɛlf.
words.spell: He traveled to Japan by himself.

words.ipa: aɪ æm ˈpæʃənət əˈbaʊt ɪt
words.spell: I am passionate about it

words.def1: Не могу поверить, что ты сделал это сам!
words.ipa: aɪ kænt bɪˈliv ju dɪd ðɪs baɪ jərˈsɛlf!
words.spell: I can't believe you did this by yourself!

words.def1: Мне нечего было делать несколько минут
words.ipa: aɪ hæd ˈnʌθɪŋ tu du fɔr ˈsɛvrəl ˈmɪnəts
words.spell: I had nothing to do for several minutes

words.ipa: aɪ prəˈfɜr ˈwɜrkɪŋ baɪ ˌmaɪˈsɛlf
words.spell: I prefer working by myself

words.ipa: aɪ wʊd bi ˈkɑmər
words.spell: I would be calmer

words.def1: Вместо того чтобы платить сантехнику, почини раковину сам
words.ipa: ɪnˈstɛd ʌv ˈpeɪɪŋ ə ˈplʌmər, fɪks ðə sɪŋk jərˈsɛlf
words.spell: Instead of paying a plumber, fix the sink yourself

words.ipa: ɪt ˈdɪdənt pæn aʊt
words.spell: it didn't pan out

words.def1: Оно затянуло меня, понравилось мне со временем
words.ipa: ɪt ɡru ɑn mi
words.spell: it grew on me

words.ipa: nɔˈstælʤə
words.spell: nostalgia

words.ipa: ˈpɪkʧər ɪf ju wɪl...
words.spell: picture if you will...

words.ipa: ʃi laɪks tu it lʌnʧ baɪ hərˈsɛlf.
words.spell: She likes to eat lunch by herself.

words.ipa: ʃi ˈpeɪntɪd ði ɪnˈtaɪər ˈmjʊrəl baɪ hərˈsɛlf.
words.spell: She painted the entire mural by herself.

words.def1: Ребёнок ещё не может ходить самостоятельно.
words.ipa: ðə ˈbeɪbi kænt wɔk baɪ hərˈsɛlf jɛt.
words.spell: The baby can't walk by herself yet.

words.ipa: ðə mɔr ... ðə mɔr
words.spell: the more ... the more

words.def1: чем больше книг я читаю, тем терпимее становлюсь к другим
words.ipa: ðə mɔr bʊks aɪ rid ðə mɔr fərˈɡɪvɪŋ aɪ æm təˈwɔrd ˈʌðərz
words.spell: the more books I read the more forgiving I am toward others

words.def1: Они сами построили домик на дереве.
words.ipa: ðeɪ bɪlt ðə ˈtrihaʊs baɪ ðɛmˈsɛlvz.
words.spell: They built the treehouse by themselves.

words.def1: Эта мебель продаётся в разобранном виде - тебе придётся собрать её самому.
words.ipa: ðɪs ˈfɜrnɪʧər kʌmz flæt-pækt-ju hæv tu əˈsɛmbəl ɪt jərˈsɛlf.
words.spell: This furniture comes flat-packed—you have to assemble it yourself.

words.ipa: tu ˈbʌbəl əˈweɪ ɑn ðə stoʊv
words.spell: to bubble away on the stove

words.ipa: tu kənˈkɑkt ə mil
words.spell: to concoct a meal

words.ipa: tu drim ʌv ˈduɪŋ ˈsʌmθɪŋ
words.spell: to dream of doing something

words.ipa: tu ɡɪv ə ˈkɑmɛnt
words.spell: to give a comment

words.ipa: tu noʊ ɪt ˈɪntəmətli
words.spell: to know it intimately

words.ipa: tu lip frʌm tri tu tri
words.spell: to leap from tree to tree

words.ipa: tu ˈpɪkʧər ðə sin
words.spell: to picture the scene

words.ipa: tu slæp əˈkrɔs ðə feɪs
words.spell: to slap across the face

words.ipa: tu stroʊl
words.spell: to stroll

words.ipa: tu teɪk ə lip ʌv feɪθ
words.spell: to take a leap of faith

words.ipa: tu ˈsʌtəl fɔr ðə ˈkɑmən ˈpælət
words.spell: too subtle for the common palate

words.def1: когда делаешь это сам, ты физически изолирован
words.ipa: wɛn ju du ɪt baɪ jərˈsɛlf ju ɑr ˈfɪzɪkəli ˈaɪsəˌleɪtɪd
words.spell: when you do it by yourself you are physically isolated

words.def1: когда делаешь это сам, ты самостоятелен
words.ipa: wɛn ju du ɪt jərˈsɛlf ju ɑr sɛlf-rɪˈlaɪənt
words.spell: when you do it yourself you are self-reliant

words.def1: Ты сама испекла этот торт? (Ты сделала это ОДНА?)
words.ipa: ju beɪkt ðɪs keɪk baɪ jərˈsɛlf? (dɪd ju du ɪt əˈloʊn?)
words.spell: You baked this cake by yourself? (Did you do it ALONE?)

words.def1: Ты сама испекла этот торт? (Ты САМА сделала?)
words.ipa: ju beɪkt ðɪs keɪk jərˈsɛlf? (dɪd ju du ɪt?)
words.spell: You baked this cake yourself? (Did YOU do it?)

words.def1: Ты не сможешь нести все эти коробки один!
words.ipa: ju kænt ˈkæri ɔl ðoʊz ˈbɑksəz baɪ jərˈsɛlf!
words.spell: You can't carry all those boxes by yourself!

words.ipa: ju jərˈsɛlf ɑr riˈspɑnsəbəl
words.spell: You yourself are responsible

words.def1: Ты сам сказал, что это правда
words.ipa: ju jərˈsɛlf sɛd ɪt wʌz tru
words.spell: You yourself said it was true

words.ipa: ˈjʌŋɡər
words.spell: younger
